on algol education automatic grading programstwo algol grader programs are presented forthe computer evaluation of student algol programs one is for a beginner's program it furnishes random dataand checks answers the other provides a searching test of the reliability and efficiency of an integrationprocedure there is a statement of the essential properties of a computer system in order thatgrader programs can be effectively used.cacm may 1965forsythe g e.wirth n.ca650501 jb march 7 1978 3:16 pm1086 4 12701132 4 12701234 4 12701263 4 12701265 4 12701270 4 12701270 4 12701323 4 12701358 4 12701379 4 12701380 4 12701453 4 12701464 4 12701484 4 12701491 4 12701498 4 12701613 4 12701614 4 12701781 4 12701825 4 12701860 4 12701902 4 12702083 4 12702178 4 12702179 4 12702252 4 12702325 4 12702341 4 12702546 4 12702645 4 12702652 4 12702684 4 12702842 4 12702929 4 12702934 4 12703069 4 1270669 4 1270679 4 1270691 4 1270761 4 1270949 4 1270989 4 1270145 5 12701270 5 12701270 5 12701270 5 12701413 5 12701902 5 12703184 5 1270145 6 12701205 6 12701270 6 12701270 6 1270
